text: a balika nim'ma hrdayagalu kathoravagi bittavu â€“ kallugalante athava avugaligintalu heccu kathora. Nijavagi, kelavu kallugalolaginda cilumegalu hom'muttave hagu kelavu kallugalu sididu avugalinda nirina dhare hariyuttade mattu kelavu kallugalu allahana bhayadinda uruli biluvudu ide. Nivu maduttiruva kelasagala bagge allahanu ajnanagilla
